.mars-component .two-column-featured-img {
  margin-left: 0;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.mars-component .two-column-featured-img figure {
  padding-top: 25px;
  padding-right: 25px;
  padding-bottom: 25px;
  z-index: 1;
  width: 100%;
}

.mars-component .two-column-featured-img .featured-img-border {
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 25px;
  z-index: 0;
  background-color: #ffdc00;
}

.mars-component .two-column-featured-content .btn {
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.mars-component .two-column-featured-content a.font-family-bold {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.mars-component .two-column-featured-content .featured-story {
  z-index: 10;
}

@media (min-width: 720px) {
  .mars-component .two-column-featured-content {
    padding-top: 25px;
  }
  .mars-component .two-column-featured-content a.font-family-bold {
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }
  .mars-component .flex-md-row-reverse .two-column-featured-img {
    margin-left: 8px;
  }
  .mars-component .flex-md-row-reverse .two-column-featured-content {
    margin-right: 27px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .mars-component .two-column-featured-img {
    margin-bottom: 40px;
  }
  .mars-component .two-column-featured-img figure {
    padding-top: 40px;
    padding-right: 40px;
    padding-bottom: 40px;
  }
  .mars-component .two-column-featured-img figure img {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 624px;
    max-height: 780px;
  }
  .mars-component .two-column-featured-img .featured-img-border {
    left: 80px;
  }
  .mars-component .two-column-featured-content .btn {
    margin-bottom: 50px;
  }
  .mars-component .two-column-featured-content a.font-family-bold {
    margin-bottom: 55px;
  }
  .mars-component .flex-md-row-reverse .two-column-featured-img {
    margin-left: 25px;
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  .mars-component .flex-md-row-reverse .two-column-featured-content {
    max-width: 560px;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: 32px;
  }
}
